comment.body: [@Binchan:](?Profile/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/1AWwhg4EiWAVttfQboJZ4wJfX3WawfJT3h/binchan2@zeroid.bit "mention:1AWwhg4EiWAVttfQboJZ4wJfX3WawfJT3h") How do you bookmark and retrieve so many posts of yours here?

[@Binchan:](?Profile/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/1AWwhg4EiWAVttfQboJZ4wJfX3WawfJT3h/binchan2@zeroid.bit "mention:1AWwhg4EiWAVttfQboJZ4wJfX3WawfJT3h") Does IIRC also help in things like service discovery I think

[@Binchan:](?Profile/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/1AWwhg4EiWAVttfQboJZ4wJfX3WawfJT3h/binchan2@zeroid.bit "mention:1AWwhg4EiWAVttfQboJZ4wJfX3WawfJT3h") My point exactly.
Comics nail it. XKCD is a champ of that. I watched Cyanide & Happiness Show, wanted to watch PHD comics movie but could not find the torrent :(
